name: py-snakemake-interface-executor-plugins

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This package provides a stable interface for interactions between
Snakemake and its executor plugins.

dependencies.name: py-argparse-dataclass
dependencies.description: An immutable mapping type for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-common
dependencies.description: Common functions and classes for Snakemake and its plugins.

dependencies.name: py-throttler
dependencies.description: Zero dependency Python package for easy throttling with asyncio support.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-cluster-sync
dependent_to.description:
A Snakemake executor plugin for cluster jobs that are executed
synchronously.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-slurm
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake executor plugin for submitting jobs to a SLURM cluster.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-tes
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake executor plugin for submitting jobs via GA4GH TES.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-cluster-generic
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake executor plugin for submitting jobs to a cluster.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-kubernetes
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake executor plugin for submission of jobs to Kubernetes.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-slurm-jobstep
dependent_to.description:
A Snakemake executor plugin for running srun jobs inside of SLURM jobs
(meant for internal use by snakemake-executor-plugin-slurm).

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-azure-batch
dependent_to.description:
A Snakemake executor plugin for submitting jobs to Microsoft Azure
Batch.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-drmaa
dependent_to.description: A snakemake executor plugin for submission of jobs via DRMAA.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-flux
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake executor plugin for the Flux scheduler.
